modName: Ancient Elven Bow Of Huntsman Mastery
summary:
\"For The Deer Hunter\" - \"Ancient Elven Bow Of Huntsman Mastery\" Based On The \"Bow Of The Hunt\"
Which Is Enchanted With \"20 Damage To Animals\"
Found In Chest In Top Level Of Helgen Keep, Along With 20 Iron Arrows, Have Increase Damage By Value Of Two Only, And Critical By Value Of One, Again Keeping In Line With Lore! 
It Is Non Replacing
descriptionHtml:
\"For The Deer Hunter\"

\"Ancient Elven Bow Of Huntsman Mastery\" Based On The \"Bow Of The Hunt\"
Which Is Enchanted With \"20 Damage To Animals\"

Found In Chest In Top Level Of Helgen Keep, Along With 20 Iron Arrows, Have Increase Damage By Value Of Two Only, And Critical By Value Of One, Again Keeping In Line With Lore! 
It Is Non Replacing,Will Not Conflict Unless Other Mods Use Same Chest!

Is a Vanilla At This Stage

Ancient Elven Bow Of Huntsman Mastery for the player to use from the begining of play!

I found no bugs in my game which was reinstalled from an earlier backup, however please let me know if you find any and I will do my best to find a solution

All credit goes to Bethseda for this mod as It is a manipulation of existing data to provide the Bow!

Version 1.1 Can Now Be Upgraded At The Blacksmiths!

Future Upgrades - 
(1) Will Add New Unique Colored Wood Texture/Textures - Befitting The Ancient Elves Culture
(2) Will Incoporate New Unique Model/Models - Befitting The Ancient Elves Culture
author: Daniel R Colgan
